Package com.kraken.krakenhax

Class HistoryRecyclerViewAdapter

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<HistoryRecyclerViewAdapter.MyViewHolder>
com.kraken.krakenhax.HistoryRecyclerViewAdapter
public class HistoryRecyclerViewAdapter extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<HistoryRecyclerViewAdapter.MyViewHolder>
Adapter to display a list of history Action items in a RecyclerView.

Each row shows a timestamp and a short description. Descriptions that reference events or users are resolved via the provided ViewModel instances (may be null in edge cases; a fallback string will be used then).

      data - the list of Action items to display (must not be null)
      eventViewModel - ViewModel used to resolve event titles (may be null)

    • onBindViewHolder

      public void onBindViewHolder(@NonNull HistoryRecyclerViewAdapter.MyViewHolder holder, int position)
      Bind data for the item at the given position. This fills in the timestamp and a resolved description. Event/profile lookups are performed asynchronously via the provided ViewModels and will update the row when the lookup completes.
      Specified by:
      onBindViewHolder in class androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<HistoryRecyclerViewAdapter.MyViewHolder>
      Parameters:
      holder - the ViewHolder to bind
      position - adapter position of the item

    • setActionDescriptionEvent

      private void setActionDescriptionEvent(String formatString, String eventID, HistoryRecyclerViewAdapter.MyViewHolder holder, Supplier<String> fallback)
      Sets the action description for cases that require only an event.
      Parameters:
      formatString - format string that expects the event title
      eventID - id of the event to resolve
      holder - view holder to update
      fallback - supplier for fallback text

    • setActionDescriptionEventAndUser

      private void setActionDescriptionEventAndUser(String formatString, String eventId, String userId, HistoryRecyclerViewAdapter.MyViewHolder holder, Supplier<String> fallback)
      Sets the action description for cases that require an event and a profile.
      Parameters:
      formatString - format string that expects the event title and organizer username
      eventId - id of the event to resolve
      userId - id of the user/profile to resolve
      holder - view holder to update
      fallback - supplier for fallback text
